author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA ACCELERATING NORTHEASTWARD... ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE THIS EVENING...
summary: ...MELISSA ACCELERATING NORTHEASTWARD... ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE THIS EVENING... As of 5:00 PM AST Thu Oct 30 the center of Melissa was located near 30.2, -69.7 with movement NE at 31 mph. The minimum central pressure was 967 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
